					 The great Supreme Commander Kim Jong Il! He is the great guardian who defended the destiny of the country and the people in the most perfect and responsible manner by exhausting all his energies while caring nothing for his own.
					
					 Shedding tears before his bier the army and people of the DPRK are calling again in their minds:
					
					 Our Supreme Commander!
					
					 This call is an expression of our people's faith to follow respected Kim Jong Un, who is identical to Kim Jong Il, to the last of their life. 
					
					 Comrade Kim Jong Un,
					
					 Please assume the supreme commandership, as wished by the people, to lead Kim Il Sung's Korea to eternal victory!

articles.title: S. Korean Organization Decides Mourners' Group to Be Formed
articles.content:
S. Korean Organization Decides Mourners' Group to Be Formed

					 Pyongyang, December 24 (KCNA) -- The South Side Committee for Implementing the June 15 Joint Declaration on Friday decided to organize a mourners' group to be sent to the north on the demise of leader Kim Jong Il. 
					
					 The group will consist of more than 40 representatives from its affiliated organizations to visit the north, said the committee.

articles.title: S. Korean Organization Mourns Demise of Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
S. Korean Organization Mourns Demise of Kim Jong Il

					 Pyongyang, December 24 (KCNA) -- The south Korean Council for the Solution of the Issue of the Volunteers' Corps made public a condolatory statement on Friday on the demise of leader Kim Jong Il.
					
					 The Council in the statement expressed profound condolences on the untimely demise of Kim Jong Il, chairman of the National Defence Commission, from a sudden illness. 
					
					 It also extended deep sympathy to the compatriots of the north in sorrow over the demise of Kim Jong Il. 
					
					 It expressed hope that the compatriots in the north would overcome sorrow and join hands to achieve national reunification and force Japan to settle its past.

articles.title: Establishment of Incense-burning Altar Called for in S. Korea
articles.content:
Establishment of Incense-burning Altar Called for in S. Korea

					 Pyongyang, December 24 (KCNA) -- A south Korean student put up a huge wall-paper calling for the establishment of incense-burning altar at campus of Seoul National University on December 26 to mourn the demise of leader Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Expressing condolences over the demise of Chairman of the National Defence Commission Kim Jong Il who adopted the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration, he called for the establishment of incense-burning altar to mourn his demise.
					
					 He expressed hope that the dispatch of a mourners' group of the south side to the north would take place for peace on the Korean Peninsula and inter-Korean reconciliation and cooperation.

articles.title: S. Korean KBS Reports Mourning Demise of Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
S. Korean KBS Reports Mourning Demise of Kim Jong Il

					 Pyongyang, December 24 (KCNA) -- KBS of south Korea reported on Friday that all people in the north are mourning in bitterest sorrow over the untimely demise of leader Kim Jong Il.
					
					 It added a large crowd of people from all walks of life in Pyongyang and local areas are mourning his demise everyday despite temperature going below zero.
					
					 Saying that even little school children are weeping bitterly, KBS noted that a total of more than 43 million people in the north turned out to mourn the leader's demise in three days since they heard the news of the demise of Chairman of the National Defence Commission Kim Jong Il.
					
					 The atmosphere of mourning the demise of Chairman Kim Jong Il is running higher in the north as days go by, said KBS.

articles.title: South Korean Media Reports Mourning Demise of Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
South Korean Media Reports Mourning Demise of Kim Jong Il

					 Pyongyang, December 24 (KCNA) -- South Korean media keep reporting about the army and people of the DPRK paying respect to leader Kim Jong Il in bitter grief upon the sad news of his passing that came like a bolt from the blue.
					
					 MBC, CBS and KBS of south Korea from Dec. 20 to 22 reported that Kim Jong Un, vice-chairman of the Central Military Commission of the Workers' Party of Korea, together with senior officials of the party, state and armed forces bodies, visited the bier of Kim Jong Il to express condolences in the bitterest grief.
					
					 Reports also said that diplomatic envoys, representatives of international organizations and military attaches corps of various countries in the DPRK mourned the passing of Kim Jong Il at his bier in the Kumsusan Memorial Palace.
					
					 Kim Jong Un stood guard beside the bier of Kim Jong Il together with members of the national funeral committee, the reports said, adding he expressed his deep thanks to diplomatic envoys, representatives of international organizations and the military attaches corps of different countries.
					
					 Officials of the party, armed forces and power bodies, working people's organizations, ministries and national institutions and servicepersons burst out sobbing before the bier of Kim Jong Il lamenting for his demise, reports said.
					
					 They also reported different countries of the world were sending messages of condolences to mourn demise of Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Radios said in detail Pyongyangites wail in grief following the sudden loss of the father of the nation.

articles.title: Bangladeshi FM Mourn Demise of Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Bangladeshi FM Mourn Demise of Kim Jong Il

					 Pyongyang, December 24 (KCNA) -- The Bangladeshi Foreign Ministry issued a statement on the demise of leader Kim Jong Il on Dec. 19.
					
					 The government and people of Bangladesh express deep condolences over the sudden demise of Kim Jong Il, supreme leader of the DPRK, the statement said.
					
					 Bangladesh has always been with the leadership of the DPRK and its people, it said, adding Bangladeshi President Zillur Rahman sent a condolence message to Vice-Chairman of the Central Military Commission of the Workers' Party of Korea Kim Jong Un, successor to Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Rashed Khan Menon, chairman of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Bangladesh, also issued a statement on Dec. 20 to express deep condolences over the demise of Kim Jong Il.
					
					 He was the great leader of the Korean people and a close friend of the Bangladeshi people, the statement noted.
					
					 It expressed conviction that the army and people of the DPRK would overcome sorrow and display strength and courage united in single mind and thus register great successes in their efforts for building a thriving socialist nation.

articles.title: Thai Organization Mourn Demise of Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Thai Organization Mourn Demise of Kim Jong Il

					 Pyongyang, December 24 (KCNA) -- The Thailand-DPRK Friendship Association issued a statement on Dec. 22 on the demise of leader Kim Jong Il.
					
					 The statement said:
					
					 Upon hearing the unbelievable news that HE Kim Jong Il passed away, we are mourning for him in humblest reverence, looking up to his benevolent image.
					
					 Invariable is our mind revering him and we are still now in bitter sorrow and grief with longing for him.
					
					 Although he passed away, his brilliant feats will remain forever in the hearts of the world progressives and the Korean people.
					
					 We are full of conviction that the Korean revolution will surely emerge victorious as it is led by Comrade Kim Jong Un who is identical to leader Kim Jong Il.
					
					 We will in the future, too, fully support the Korean people in their efforts to accomplish the Korean revolution at any cost, true to the leadership of respected Comrade Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Swedish Organization Mourns Demise of Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Swedish Organization Mourns Demise of Kim Jong Il

					 Pyongyang, December 24 (KCNA) -- The Sweden-Korea Friendship Association released a bulletin on Dec. 21 on the passing away of leader Kim Jong Il.
					
					 The bulletin carried an article titled "Kim Jong Il, Great Statesman and Popular Leader" with photos showing his energetic external activities.
					
					 The article said:
					
					 The world came upon the sad news that leader Kim Jong Il of the DPRK passed away.
					
					 He had worked day and night for the happiness of the people since his start of work at the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea in 1964. He died of great mental and physical strain on his way of endless field guidance.
					
					 In July 1994, President Kim Il Sung suddenly passed away and the DPRK suffered consecutive natural disasters. However, the Korean people could victoriously conclude the Arduous March and resolutely wage the vigorous drive for translating the ideals of the President into reality under the Songun politics of Kim Jong Il.
					
					 His Songun politics helped lay the groundwork for the DPRK to develop into a prosperous and powerful socialist country and provide guarantee for peace in Northeast Asia. It also brought the landmark for Korea's reunification, the core of which is the idea of "By our nation itself", in June 2000.
					
					 The Korean people are now undergoing the bitter sorrow at his demise, but they will overcome the present trial as there is the unbreakable ideological unity centered on their leader.
					
					 The Sweden-Korea Friendship Association expresses deepest condolences to respected Comrade Kim Jong Un and the Korean people.

articles.title: Article Praising Kim Jong Il Posted on Chinese Internet Website
articles.content:
Article Praising Kim Jong Il Posted on Chinese Internet Website

					 Pyongyang, December 24 (KCNA) -- Xinhua Website of China posted an article praising leader Kim Jong Il over his demise.
					
					 It said:
					
					 Upon hearing the unexpected news that Comrade Kim Jong Il, general secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea, chairman of the DPRK National Defence Commission and supreme commander of the Korean People's Army, passed away to their regret, the Chinese people express their deepest condolences and heartfelt sympathy to the Korean people.
					
					 We have seen the Korean people deeply mourning his demise in bitter tears.
					
					 It is unexpected that he passed away on a train while devoting all efforts to the happiness of the Korean people and the building of a thriving nation.
					
					 He resolutely stood against the West's high-handed practices and pressure and thus put the DPRK, not big in terms of territory and population, on the international arena.
					
					 It is quite natural that he enjoys the love and reverence of the people.
					
					 Today standing in the van of the Korean people is the young leader.
					
					 They will invariably carry forward to the end the idea and cause of Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: Foreign Media Reports Mourning Demise of Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Foreign Media Reports Mourning Demise of Kim Jong Il

					 Pyongyang, December 24 (KCNA) -- Media of different countries between Dec. 19 and 21 gave wide publicity to news that the Korean people are mourning the demise of leader Kim Jong Il in bitterest grief.
					
					 Xinhua News Agency and People's Daily of China said the Korean people visited Kim Il Sung Square, the plazas of the April 25 House of Culture and the Pyongyang Indoor Stadium and other places where portraits of Kim Jong Il are displayed and mourned his demise.
					
					 CCTV aired programs dealing with memorial services in the DPRK and events in different countries to express condolences over his demise.
					
					 Huanqiu Shibao said media of the DPRK are introducing the heroic life of Kim Jong Il.
					
					 ITAR-TASS of Russia gave a detailed account of the fact that the Korean people continue to express condolences over the untimely demise of Kim Jong Il and media of the DPRK are devoting space and airing programs to deal with the undying feats performed by him.
					
					 Ria-Novosti of Russia released a report titled "Korean people mourn the demise of leader Kim Jong Il in tears." 
					
					 The Associated Press of the U.S. said the army and people of the DPRK are praising Kim Jong Un, vice-chairman of the Central Military Commission of the Workers' Party of Korea, as a distinguished great man and great successor to the revolutionary cause of Juche, adding that they vow to loyally uphold his leadership.
					
					 Kyodo News of Japan also conveyed news of the Korean people's mourning over their leader's demise.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il Praised by Vietnam and Bangladesh Papers
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Praised by Vietnam and Bangladesh Papers

					 Pyongyang, December 24 (KCNA) -- The papers of Vietnam and Bangladesh carried special write-ups on the demise of leader Kim Jong Il on Dec. 20.
					
					 The Vietnamese paper Quan Doi Nhan Dan carried an article titled "Great leader of the Korean people" illustrated with a photo of Kim Jong Il's revolutionary activities. It noted the life of Kim Jong Il is just the history of modern Korea.
					
					  The article gave a detailed account of the fact that he glorified the Juche idea as the great guiding idea in the era of independence and developed the Workers' Party of Korea into an eternal party of President Kim Il Sung and the DPRK into a political, ideological and military power which nobody can provoke and provided the historic June 15 north-south joint declaration, a limestone of national reunification.
					
					 He was deeply respected by the world public for his noble personality and undying feats, it noted.
					
					 The Bangladeshi paper Blits carried an article titled "Wish of leader Kim Jong Il" illustrated with his portrait.
					
					 It said that Kim Jong Il dedicated himself to the happiness of the people all his life.
					
					 It was thanks to his dedication that the DPRK could emerge a satellite producer and launcher and a nuclear weapons state to join the ranks of a few countries possessing those things in the world and the Juche-based industry made rapid progress in the era of great surge, the article noted, adding:
					
					 The Korean people will always hold him in high esteem calling him "father".

articles.title: Floral Tribute Paid to Kim Jong Suk
articles.content:
Floral Tribute Paid to Kim Jong Suk

					 Pyongyang, December 24 (KCNA) -- Wreaths were laid before the bust of anti-Japanese war hero Kim Jong Suk in the Revolutionary Martyrs Cemetery on Mt. Taesong on Saturday on her 94th birth anniversary.
					
					 A wreath sent by Kim Jong Un, vice-chairman of the Central Military Commission of the Workers' Party of Korea, was seen standing before her bust.
					
					 Present at the wreath-laying ceremony were senior officials of party, state and armed forces organs Kim Yong Nam, Choe Yong Rim, Ri Yong Ho, Kim Yong Chun, the chairperson of a friendly party, officials of party, armed forces and power bodies, the Cabinet, working people's organizations, ministries and national institutions and servicepersons of the Korean People's Army and the Korean People's Internal Security Forces and working people from all walks of life and youths and students here.
					
					 Laid before her bust were wreaths in the name of the Central Committee of the WPK and the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly and the DPRK Cabinet.
					
					 Also placed there were wreaths in the name of the Ministry of the People's Armed Forces, the Ministry of People's Security, working people's organizations, ministries, national institutions, units of the KPA, educational, health and media institutions, revolutionary schools, the joint national organization of the Korean Children's Union and the party and power bodies, factories and others in Pyongyang.
					
					 Participants paid silent tribute to Kim Jong Suk, looking back on her great revolutionary career.
					
					 Meanwhile, the chief of the Pyongyang mission of the Anti-imperialist National Democratic Front laid a bouquet before her bust and observed a moment's silence.
					
					 Floral baskets were placed before her statues in Kim Jong Suk County, Hoeryong City, at Kim Jong Suk Naval University and Kim Jong Suk General Military Academy on the same day.

articles.title: Koreans Visit Kim Jong Suk's Statue
articles.content:
Koreans Visit Kim Jong Suk's Statue

					 Pyongyang, December 24 (KCNA) -- December 24 marks the 94th birth anniversary of anti-Japanese war hero Kim Jong Suk. 
					
					 On this occasion, many servicepersons and people have visited her statue in Hoeryong City, North Hamgyong Province, with bitter grief at the demise of leader Kim Jong Il.  
					
					 Yu Kwang Ryol, an official of the Hoeryong City People's Committee, told KCNA:
					
					 "We used to come here this day every year and vow before her statue to faithfully uphold the leadership of Kim Jong Il. We have never expected that we would stand before her statue with such a deep grief."
					
					Song Yong Nam, an officer of the Korean People's Army who visited the Revolutionary Martyrs Cemetery on Mt. Taesong in Pyongyang, said:
					
					 "I will do my best to glorify the great exploits Kim Jong Suk performed in ensuring the continuity of the Juche-based revolutionary cause. The three commanders of Mt. Paektu (President Kim Il Sung, leader Kim Jong Il and anti-Japanese war hero Kim Jong Suk) will always remain in the mind of the Korean people advancing under the great leadership of Comrade Kim Jong Un."

articles.title: Great Life Recorded in History of Songun-based Revolution
articles.content:
Great Life Recorded in History of Songun-based Revolution

					 Pyongyang, December 24 (KCNA) -- Recorded in the history of the protracted Korean revolution is the great life of Kim Jong Suk, an anti-Japanese war hero, who faithfully upheld President Kim Il Sung's cause of the Songun (military-first) revolution.
					
					 Kim Jong Suk, who started revolutionary activities in her teens, devoted her all to the independence of the nation and the freedom and emancipation of the people till the end of her life.
					
					 It was her unshakable belief that the goal of revolutionaries' life and the value of their genuine life find themselves in defending the President politically and ideologically and at the risk of their lives. 
					
					 Her spirit of devotedly defending the President was fully displayed in fierce battles in Fusong town, Hongqihe, Dashahe gully and other areas during the anti-Japanese armed struggle. 
					
					 She steadfastly defended the President's ideas and policies from a renegade revolutionary in the Qingfeng secret camp. She also dried the President's clothes against her own body in the biting cold of around 40 degrees centigrade below zero, and always paid deep concern to the security of the headquarters of the Korean People's Revolutionary Army (KPRA). 
					
					 In the period of the building of a new country after national liberation, she guided the work of creating the immortal revolutionary hymn "Song of General Kim Il Sung" and the full-length epic "Mt. Paektu".
					
					 She was famous for excellent marksmanship, marvelous strategy and peerless valor. 
					
					 After the liberation of the country she worked hard for the building of an army. 
					
					 She visited an ammunitions factory several times to lay foundations of the defense industry and gave valuable instructions concerning the training of many able military personnel at Pyongyang Institute and other military academies and building of air, naval and tank forces.
					
					 She deeply loved her comrades and people all her life.
					
					 President Kim Il Sung wrote in his reminiscences "With the Century" that Kim Jong Suk lived all her life not for herself, but for her comrades and that all she did throughout her life was for her comrades, her fellows and for the revolution, not for her own benefit. 
					
					 The Korean people well know the stories that she carried an iron pot full of boiling gruel on her head to other KPRA members who were fighting on a height and that she mended others' uniforms and shoes without taking time to relieve her own fatigue.

articles.title: Kim Jong Suk's Brilliant Life
articles.content:
Kim Jong Suk's Brilliant Life

					 Pyongyang, December 24 (KCNA) -- On display at the Korean Revolution Museum are a certificate of DPRK Hero, Gold Star Medal and Order of National Flag 1st Class awarded to anti-Japanese war hero Kim Jong Suk. 
					
					 They show the great revolutionary exploits she performed for President Kim Il Sung and the revolution. 
					
					 Before joining the Korean People's Revolutionary Army, Kim Jong Suk made a resolve to venerate President Kim Il Sung as the sun of the nation and always follow the sun like star.
					
					 The resolve was based on her unshakable will to devotedly defend the President. She was true to the resolve all her life.
					
					 She defended the President politically and ideologically and at the risk of her life and implanted his revolutionary line in people's mind in the period of the anti-Japanese armed struggle.
					
					 After the liberation of the country, she continued creditably ensuring the safety of the President, while conducting energetic activities to rally people from all walks of life around him.

articles.title: Heritage Left by Kim Jong Suk
articles.content:
Heritage Left by Kim Jong Suk

					 Pyongyang, December 24 (KCNA) -- December 24 marks the 94th birth anniversary of anti-Japanese war hero Kim Jong Suk. 
					
					 The Korean people commemorate the day as significantly as President Kim Il Sung's birthday (Apr. 15) and leader Kim Jong Il's birthday (Feb. 16.)
					
					 On this occasion, the Korean people pay the highest tribute to her.
					
					Her life was not long but she performed great feats in her lifetime for the country and people and for the times and history. 
					
					 The greatest of her feats is that she provided the future of the Korean revolution. 
					
					 She devoted herself to bringing up her son, Kim Jong Il, as wished by the President. 
					
					 One day in the secret camp in Mt. Paektu, the little son asked his mother about the meaning of the name of his father, the President. 
					
					 At that time she answered, "Though there are many stars in the sky, no star can do for the sun. Likewise, no one can take the place of the father. Father is our sun as his name means."
					
					 When the immortal revolutionary hymn "Song of General Kim Il Sung" was created, she taught her son it first. 
					
					 She also told him stories about the revolutionary feats of the President and the Korean people's pride in being guided by him. 
					
					 True to her desire, Kim Jong Il successfully carried forward the revolutionary cause of Juche started in Mt. Paektu. 
					
					 This is the greatest heritage she left for the Workers' Party of Korea and the country.

articles.title: Revolutionary Sites Tell Exploits of Kim Jong Suk
articles.content:
Revolutionary Sites Tell Exploits of Kim Jong Suk

					 Pyongyang, December 24 (KCNA) -- There are many revolutionary sites associated with the undying exploits of Kim Jong Suk, an anti-Japanese war hero, in the DPRK.
					
					 Kim Jong Suk defended President Kim Il Sung politically and ideologically and at the risk of her life in the period of the anti-Japanese revolutionary struggle and made a great contribution to the liberation of Korea.
					
					 After the liberation, she performed great feats in implementing the revolutionary line of the President.
					
					 There is a revolutionary site in Hoeryong City, North Hamgyong Province, where Kim Jong Suk was born and spent her childhood.
					
					 Preserved in Ryanggang and North and South Hamgyong provinces are relics associated with her revolutionary activities in the period of the anti-Japanese armed struggle.
					
					 Yonsa is a historical place where Kim Jong Suk conducted revolutionary activities in the latter half of the 1930s and the first half of the 1940s.
					
					 While in Yonsa, she organized a branch committee of the Association for the Restoration of the Fatherland and a branch party organization.
					
					 Basing herself in Phungsan, Ryanggang Province, she had contacts with members of revolutionary organizations active in Tanchon and Riwon and guided underground revolutionary organizations in Tanchon, Pukchong and other local areas.
					
					 After returning home along with the liberation of the country, she devoted her all to implementing the line of the President on building a new country.
					
					 She conducted energetic activities in different parts of the country, including Pyongyang and South Hamgyong and Kangwon provinces.
					
					 On the occasion of her birth anniversary (Dec. 24), many people have visited the revolutionary sites to learn about the exploits she performed for the country, revolution and people.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Assumption of KPA Supreme Commandership Observed
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Assumption of KPA Supreme Commandership Observed

					 Pyongyang, December 24 (KCNA) -- Rodong Sinmun Saturday editorially observes the 20th anniversary of assumption of supreme commandership of the Korean People's Army by leader Kim Jong Il, invincible and iron-willed commander. His gain of one victory after another is a shining review of Kim Jong Il's glorious history of Songun revolution, the editorial notes, and goes on:
					
					 The whole life of Kim Jong Il was a brilliant life of the great Songun commander who began his revolutionary activities with arms and won one victory after another with the might of Songun.
					
					 The past two decades of his Songun revolution during which Kim Jong Il led the Korean revolution after assuming the heavy responsibility as the supreme commander of the KPA was the period recorded with heroic feats as he won the most shining victory in the nation's history in the crucible of the most arduous struggle. It is brilliantly adorned as two decades of great succession in which he firmly defended President Kim Il Sung's ideas and exploits. 
					
					 It was thanks to his Songun leadership that the history of victory which started in the forest of Mt. Paektu under the leadership of the President could be given steady continuity generation after generation and an eternal foundation could be laid for a rosy future of Kim Il Sung's Korea.
					
					 Kim Jong Il was the most illustrious commander who built the People's Army into an invincible army remaining most loyal to the ideas and cause of the President as a successor to the Songun tradition of Mt. Paektu. He was an invincible and iron-willed commander who provided an eternal foundation on which all the servicepersons and people could firmly defend the dignity and sovereignty of the nation and the socialist cause under any circumstances.
					
					 Kim Jong Il was the great leader who provided a sure guarantee for steadily carrying forward the cause of the Juche-oriented revolutionary cause, the cause of Songun revolution.
					
					 He implanted profound truth about arms into the mind of respected Kim Jong Un and helped him prize it already long ago.
					
					 Kim Jong Un is the Mt. Paektu-style great man who acquired qualifications and personality as the leader of Songun revolution on the highest level.
					
					 Our country and the Korean revolution have a rosy future as they are led by Kim Jong Un possessed of intense loyalty and the noble sense of moral obligation towards the leader, extraordinary ideological and theoretical wisdom, matchless courage and outstanding leadership art.

articles.title: Feats of Kim Jong Il and Kim Jong Suk Praised
articles.content:
Feats of Kim Jong Il and Kim Jong Suk Praised

					 Pyongyang, December 24 (KCNA) -- Events were held in different countries from Dec. 15 to 18 to mark the 20th anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's assumption of supreme commandership of the Korean People's Army and the 94th birth anniversary of anti-Japanese war hero Kim Jong Suk. They included a meeting in Britain, a seminar, a photo exhibition and a film show in Bangladesh and a lecture and a film show in Indonesia.
					
					  The chairman of the British Association for the Study of Songun Policy said that Kim Jong Il gave priority to military affairs before all fields after he started Songun revolutionary leadership, thus winning victories in the political and military confrontation with the U.S. imperialists and their followers.
					
					 He recalled that by holding Kim Jong Il in high esteem as the supreme commander the Korean People's Army, it grew to be a matchless army fully prepared politically and ideologically and in military technique.
					
					 The chairman of the Bangladesh Institute of the Juche Idea said that Kim Jong Suk was a great revolutionary who performed great exploits for the liberation of Korea and the building a new country.
					
					 He said that Kim Jong Suk is always remembered by the Korean people and progressive humankind.

articles.title: Kim Jong Suk Praised by Bangladeshi Papers
articles.content:
Kim Jong Suk Praised by Bangladeshi Papers

					 Pyongyang, December 24 (KCNA) -- Newspapers of Bangladesh carried articles on the occasion of the 94th birth anniversary of anti-Japanese war hero Kim Jong Suk. 
					
					 The Dec. 18 issue of Ekota said in an article titled "Kim Jong Suk Pyongyang Silk Mill":
					
					 She visited factories, rural villages, schools, hospitals, nurseries and many other units for just four years from the country's liberation till the last moments of her life, assisting President Kim Il Sung in his work.
					
					 There is in Pyongyang, the capital of the DPRK, the Kim Jong Suk Silk Mill associated with the footprints of Kim Jong Suk whom the Korean people and the world progressives praise as an anti-Japanese war hero, the article noted, and went on:
					
					 When visiting the mill on April 12, 1947 she urged its officials to love the workers, mindful that it is not machines but people that do job.
					
					 She stressed the need to pay deep attention to working and living conditions of workers, to the living of the lodgers, in particular.
					
					 The mill has made steady progress as a producer of silk yarn, a specialty of Korea, thanks to the field guidance given by President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il many times. 
					
					 Natun Katha on Dec. 19 carried an article titled "Life Dedicated to Others." It spoke highly of the noble personality of Kim Jong Suk who dedicated herself to comrades and people.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il as Supreme Commander Marked Abroad Annually
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il as Supreme Commander Marked Abroad Annually

					 Pyongyang, December 24 (KCNA) -- December 24, anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il as supreme commander of the Korean People's Army has been marked every year by 100 odd countries and regions for the past two decades.
					
					  Kim Jong Il assumed the heavy responsibility of the KPA supreme commander at the 19th Plenary Meeting of the 6th Central Committee of the WPK on Dec. 24, 1991. Just after this announcement it was widely reported by more than 700 news agencies, newspapers and radios including Xinhua and UPI. 
					
					 The Indian paper Indian Times and other media of the world said it was an honor for the DPRK that Kim Jong Il held the important responsibility of KPA supreme commander.
					
					 A total of over 4,000 various political and cultural events were held in different parts of the five continents on the anniversary every year. They included events to hang portraits of Kim Jong Il, Kimjongilia exhibitions, meetings, exhibitions of books, photos and handicrafts and poem recital.
					
					 Robust publicity promotion has been made every year before and after the anniversary.
					
					 Works of Kim Jong Il and books praising him were brought out and books and anthologies published on the anniversary in various countries.
					
					 Political parties, organizations and regional and international institutions issued bulletins and posted articles praising his Songun leadership feats on their Internet homepages and at least 2 500 mass media of various countries carried special write-ups and televised Korean films, adding to the festive mood.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un vuelve a rendir homenaje a Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un vuelve a rendir homenaje a Kim Jong Il

					Pyongyang, 24 de diciembre (ACNC) -- El vicepresidente de la Comision Militar Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y maximo Dirigente de las fuerzas armadas coreanas, Kim Jong Un, volvio a expresar profundas condolencias el dia 24 ante el cuerpo del Dirigente Kim Jong Il junto con los miembros de la CMC del PTC y del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, los miembros de mando principal del EPC, los integrantes de mando de operaciones de la Comandancia Suprema del EPC y los comandantes de grandes unidades combinadas del EPC.
					
					Transcurria un clima solemne en el Palacio Memorial Kumsusan donde esta conservado el cuerpo de Kim Jong Il.
					
					El feretro del difunto esta rodeado por flores y el cuerpo esta cubierto de una bandera roja que refleja el deseo de toda su vida. 
					
					En el lugar de ceremonia de condolencias estaba colocada una ofrenda floral enviada por            Kim Jong Un.
					
					Custodiaban el feretro los miembros de la comision funeraria estatal y lo flanqueaban los guardias de honor de las fuerzas terrestres, navales y aereas del EPC y de la Guardia Roja Obrero-Campesina. 
					
					 Junto con los miembros de la CMC del PTC y del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, los comandantes principales del EPC, los integrantes del mando de operaciones de la Comandancia Suprema del EPC y los comandantes de las grandes unidades combinadas del EPC, Kim Jong Un entro en el hall donde se conserva el cuerpo del Dirigente. 
					
					Con el profundo sentimiento de pesar,             Kim Jong Un guardo un momento de silencio con los acompanantes en memoria de Kim Jong Il formulando votos por su eternidad en representacion de la devocion unanime de todos los oficiales y soldados del EPC.
					
					Los participantes juraron defender con las fuerzas armadas la patria socialista y garantizar el cumplimiento de la causa de construccion del Estado prospero, al materializar cabalmente en la construccion del ejercito y actividades militares las inmortales hazanas realizadas por el Comandante Supremo en su direccion sobre el ejercito tomandolas como linea de vida y al hacer a todo el ejercito apoyar con fidelidad la direccion de Kim Jong Un bajo la consigna de "!Defendamos a vida o muerte al Comite Central del Partido encabezado por el estimado camarada Kim Jong Un!"

articles.title: Raul Castro Ruz expresa condolencias en embajada coreana
articles.content:
Raul Castro Ruz expresa condolencias en embajada coreana

					Pyongyang, 24 de diciembre (ACNC) -- Raul Castro Ruz, Primer Secretario del Comite Central del Partido Comunista de Cuba y Presidente de los Consejos de Estado y de Ministerios de la Republica de Cuba, visito el dia 22 la embajada coreana en su pais para expresar condolencias por el fallecimiento del Dirigente Kim Jong Il. 
					
					Le acompano el canciller Bruno Rodriguez Parilla. 
					
					Raul Castro Ruz guardo un minuto de silencio tras rendir tributo al Dirigente ante su retrato. 
					
					El escribio en la nota de condolencias senalando que en nombre del Partido Comunista de Cuba, el gobierno y el pueblo cubanos, expresa profundas condolencias por el fallecimiento del companero    Kim Jong Il, Secretario General del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del  Ejercito Popular de Corea. Continuo que el deceso de Kim Jong Il es una gran perdida incompensable para la nacion coreana y la causa socialista. 
					
					Encomendo respetuosamente al embajador coreano Kwon Sung Chol transmitir su sentimiento de condolencias y saludo al vicepresidente de la Comision Militar Central del PTC, Kim Jong Un. 
					
					Destaco que visito la embajada coreana para rendir tributo al companero Kim Jong Il.
					
					Senalo que es muy doloroso y demasiado temprano el deceso de Kim Jong Il y asevero que aunque el companero Kim Jong Il fallecio, el pueblo coreano cuenta con el companero Kim Jong Un, lider del partido, el ejercito y el pueblo, quien continua exitosamente la causa del Dirigente. 
					
					Afirmo que bajo la guia de Kim Jong Un, el pueblo coreano llevara adelante la causa de  Kim Il Sung y de Kim Jong Il. 
					
					Rogo que transmitiera a la Direccion Coreana la voluntad del partido, el gobierno y el pueblo de Cuba de desarrollar incesantemente las relaciones de amistad con el partido, el gobierno y el pueblo coreanos en todos los aspectos y el deseo de si mismo de reunirse con el companero Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Depositan ofrendas florales ante el busto de Kim Jong Suk
articles.content:
Depositan ofrendas florales ante el busto de Kim Jong Suk

					Pyongyang, 24 de diciembre (ACNC) -- Con motivo del 94o aniversario de natalicio de la Heroina de la Lucha Antijaponesa Kim Jong Suk fueron depositadas el dia 24 las ofrendas florales ante su busto en el Cementerio de Martires Revolucionarios en el Monte Taesong.
					
					 Tambien estaba puesta la ofrenda floral enviada por el vicepresidente de la Comision Militar Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea Kim Jong Un.
					
					En el acto participaron los cuadros directivos de los organos del Partido, el Estado y las Fuerzas Armadas: Kim Yong Nam, Choe Yong Rim, Ri Yong Ho, Kim Yong Chun, etc., el presidente de partido amigo, funcionarios de los organos del partido, las Fuerzas Armadas y el Poder, el Consejo de Ministros, organizaciones de masas, ministerios y organos centrales, oficiales y soldados del Ejercito Popular de Corea y del Ejercito de Seguridad Interior del Pueblo de Corea, trabajadores de distintos sectores, jovenes y ninos escolares de la capital.
					
					Fueron colocadas las ofrendas florales en nombre del CC del PTC, el Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema y el Consejo de Ministros de la RPDC, los Ministerios de las Fuerzas Armadas Populares y de Seguridad del Pueblo, las organizaciones de masas, ministerios y organos centrales, unidades del EPC, instituciones de educacion, salud publica, prensa e informacion, escuelas revolucionarias, el conjunto nacional de Organizaciones de la Union de Ninos de Corea, los organismos del partido y el Poder, fabricas, etc. en la ciudad de Pyongyang.
					
					Los participantes guardaron un momento de silencio recordando la vida revolucionaria de la Heroina.
					
					Por otra parte, lo hizo tambien el representante de la sucursal del Frente Democratico Nacional Antiimperialista en Pyongyang.
					
					Ademas, fueron depositados los cestos de flores ante las estatuas de bronce erguidas en el distrito Kim Jong Suk, la ciudad de Hoeryong, la Academia de Fuerzas Navales Kim Jong Suk y la Escuela General de Oficiales Kim Jong Suk.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il es invencible bandera de Corea del Songun
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il es invencible bandera de Corea del Songun

					Pyongyang, 24 de diciembre (ACNC) -- La invencibilidad es el balance brillante de la gloriosa historia de la revolucion del Songun del Dirigente Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Asi senala el diario Rodong Sinmun en su editorial publicado el dia 24 en ocasion del 20o aniversario del nombramiento del Dirigente como Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea y continua:
					
					 El Dirigente condujo solo a la victoria la revolucion coreana con las fuerzas armadas y el poderio del Songun.
					
					  La cronica de la revolucion del Songun de 20 anos pasados del Dirigente transmite sus proezas heroicas realizadas en medio de la ardua lucha por defender la idea y las hazanas del lider.
					
					  Gracias a la direccion del Songun del Dirigente, la historia de la victoria iniciada en la selva de Paektu por el Presidente Kim Il Sung, continua de generacion en generacion y se ha preparado la firme base para el futuro de la Corea de Kim Il Sung.
					
					  El Dirigente es el general mas famoso del mundo quien convirtio el ejercito popular en el invencible ejercito poderoso que apoya fielmente la idea y la causa del lider al heredar la tradicion del Songun del Paektu y el genial comandante de acero quien preparo la base eterna que posibilita a todo el ejercito y todo el pueblo defender hasta el final la dignidad y la independencia de la nacion y la causa socialista.
					
					  Ademas, Kim Jong Il es el gran Dirigente quien preparo la decisiva garantia capaz de lograr de continuo la causa revolucionaria del Juche y del Songun.
					
					  El Dirigente hizo que Kim Jong Un conociera la profunda verdad de las fuerzas armadas y contrajera relaciones con estas.
					
					  Kim Jong Un es el gran hombre de tipo del monte Paektu quien poseyo en la maxima altura la cualidad y la noble personalidad como dirigente de la revolucion del Songun. 
					
					Sera radiante el futuro de la patria y la revolucion gracias al vicepresidente Kim Jong Un quien cuenta con la infinita fidelidad al lider y la noble obligacion moral, la extraordinaria perspicacia ideo-teorica, la audacia sin par y la destacada arte de guia.
